Based on 2022 paper, "" Does culture moderate relationships between rumination and symptoms of depression and PTSD? 

-overall rumination rates
 -difference by ethnicity
                income
                age
                religion 
                gender
                education
                *trauma type (for PTSD)


```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(naniar)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)

```

```{r}
depress<-read_csv(here("R_project", "Rumination Depression.csv")) %>% clean_names
```


```{r}
ptsd<-read_csv(here("R_project","Rumination PTSD.csv")) %>% clean_names
```

```{r}
glimpse (ptsd)
```

```{r}
naniar::miss_var_summary(depress)
```


```{r}
glimpse(ptsd)
```
```{r}
naniar::miss_var_summary(ptsd)
```
